data.eml:eml: Mimulus peregrinus (Phrymaceae): A new British allopolyploid species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vallejo-Marin, Mario (2012): Mimulus peregrinus (Phrymaceae): A new British allopolyploid species. PhytoKeys 14: 1-14, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.14.3305, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.14.3305
